title: Cover Image
content:
The cover image is based on the Review Article Immune disorders induced by improper use of dietary immunostimulants in aquatic animals: Research progress and prospective solutions by targeting gut microbiota by Qingshuang Zhang and Hongwei Yang et al., https://doi.org/10.1111/raq.12852.

[Correction added on 27 March 2024, after first online publication: Cover image has been changed]
